name.en: Work Motivation and Strategic Reward System
name.ch: 工作動機與策略性獎酬制度

department.ch: 人力資源管理研究所碩士班

goal.en: This course will discuss the researches and practices of worker’s attitudes and behavior. The content of the teaching material will focus on work motivation and its applications in designing a strategic reward system, which purpose is to achieve higher organizational effectiveness. Theories and implications in practices are equally emphasized in this class. All students are expected to read the assigned articles before coming to the classroom, and to lead a group discussion."

flex_desc.en: The students are encouraged to collect field data from companies or cases. They can find relevant information or topics related to work motivation and compensation systems via multi-media methods in the extra two weeks of time.
flex_desc.ch:
第17周: 各組於校外進行專案的資訊收集或公司個案訪談
第18周: 針對工作動機與薪酬制度的設計與功能等相關議題，進行多媒體方式探詢與理解。
